title: Laura's New Life
description: First the dognapping, and now Lars shows up to be the hero? What the heck is happening in Laura's life? Can she get away with the justifiable crime of taking care of Sharise?In this third and final story in The Ice Cream Shop Boy trilogy, Laura spends some quality time with her two ice cream boys, Shawn and Zach.Summer turns to Fall, then Winter, and who will she choose to snuggle up with next to a flickering fire? Will it just be Laura and her beloved mutt Princess, together forever?Story #3 of a 3-story series.
author: Mimi Strong
